oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Three new spirocyclic palladium(0) complexes containing diphosphines derived from N,N '-substituted ethylenediamines
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BALAKRISHNA, MS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: transition-metal chemistry
phosphorus-based ligands
ruthenium(ii) chemistry
ph
o2c6h4
x-2
me
spirocyclic palladium (0) complexes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The reactions of Ph2PN(R)CH2CH2N(R)PPh2 (LL) (1 R=CH2Ph, 2 R=Ph, 3 R=CH3) with [Pd-2(dba)(3)] (dba=dibenzylidene acetone) in CH2Cl2 yield mononuclear complexes of the type [Pd(eta (2)-LL)(2)] in good yield.
